author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description:
This PR adds the HI scenarios to be used in Tier0 for 2023 HI data-taking.
The new scenarios are based on the "2023" Eras introduced by @mandrenguyen in #41571.

| Era | Scenario | 
| --- | --- |
| `Run3_pp_on_PbPb_2023` | `ppEra_Run3_pp_on_PbPb_2023` |
| `Run3_pp_on_PbPb_approxSiStripClusters_2023` | `ppEra_Run3_pp_on_PbPb_approxSiStripClusters_2023` |


#### PR validation:
Code compiles and I also run:
```
scram b runtests_TestConfigDP
```
As far as I know we don't have streamer files on which the usual `RunPromptReco.py` command can be tested.

#### Backport:
Not a backport, but a 13_2_X backport will be provided soon

---
FYI @cms-sw/alca-l2 @cms-sw/ppd-l2 @mandrenguyen @icali @mmusich
title: Add 2023 HI scenarios
